title: J's Closet Volume 1
description: No head games, just fun games. Come along with J and her swoon-worthy husband Travis, as this sexy married couple explore the contents of J's extensive wardrobe. Whether they're in Travis' Charger, on a beach in Mexico or at a hot yoga class, J's got the right outfit to make Travis sit-up and beg. J's Closet: Volume 1 includes the first five stories in the series. J's White Tank Top. J's Pink Bikini. J's Little Black Dress. J's Purple Scarf and J's Red Yoga Pants. Plus, a bonus look at the couples St. Patrick's Day romp. * Warning: Explicit Sexual Content and Language. Intended for 18+ Audiences*
author: Ryan O'Leary
